definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: Then we relaxed and enjoyed our lunch to the sound of screeching sea birds and crashing waves.
sentences.chinese: 然后自在地在海鸟尖声鸣叫和拍浪声中享用午餐。

sentences.english: A bird of the order Passeriformes.
Among the most spectacular sights are the great sea-bird colonies.
sentences.chinese: 庞大的海鸟群是最壮观的景象之一。

sentences.english: At about four o'clock, the roustabouts are roused by the sound of seabirds.
sentences.chinese: 四点左右，海鸟的叫声将使水手从梦中惊醒。

sentences.english: Guano means droppings from seabirds used as a sort of fertilizer .
sentences.chinese: 鸟粪层就是海鸟的粪便，可以用作肥料。

sentences.english: Many sea birds live on fish.
sentences.chinese: 大多数海鸟都以鱼为食物。

sentences.english: At that point they increasingly start to eat seabirds, as well as other mice.
sentences.chinese: 这时，他们愈发吃起海鸟以及其它老鼠。

sentences.english: Lo the evening has come down upon the shore and in the fading light the seabirds come flying to their nests.
sentences.chinese: 看吧，暮色已经笼罩海岸，苍茫里海鸟已群飞归巢。

sentences.english: Flap your flaming wings, as many a seabird sings.
sentences.chinese: 鼓起你火焰般的羽翼吧，海鸟在歌唱。

sentences.english: These circular pens are fifty meters wide and covered with netting to keep out seabirds.
sentences.chinese: 这些圆形的渔场宽50米，用网覆盖来防止海鸟。

sentences.english: This pollution is now devastating populations of seabirds and fish that live in the region.
sentences.chinese: 污染目前对该地区的海鸟和鱼类造成了破环性的影响。

sentences.english: That's her on the beach wiping oil off the sea-birds' feathers.
sentences.chinese: 她会在沙滩上为海鸟们抹走羽毛上的油污。

sentences.english: Lo, the evening has come down upon the shore and in the fading light the seabirds come flying to their nests.
sentences.chinese: 看罢，暮色已经笼罩海岸，苍茫里海鸟已群飞归巢。

sentences.english: A seabird with oil soil all over it tumbled into a swamp and never headed out.
sentences.chinese: 浑身沾满油污的海鸟跌入沼泽，再也没有露出头来。

sentences.english: When I hear those seabirds cry.
sentences.chinese: 当我听到那些海鸟哭时。

sentences.english: Spirit is like the seabird perching on the verge of the cliff, waiting for the moment to fly skywards.
sentences.chinese: 精神如栖身于悬崖边的海鸟，在等候冲天而飞的时刻。

definition: (bird species of China) mew gull (Larus canus)
(bird species of China) little egret (Egretta garzetta)
(bird species of China) sooty tern (Onychoprion fuscatus)
